'''''Minecraft: The Manga'' Volume 8''' is the eighth {{W|tankōbon}} volume of the ''[[Minecraft: The Manga]]'' series.

== Chapters ==
*36. To the Unknown World, the End!! (未知の世界、ジ・エンドへ!!, ''Michi no Sekai, Ji Endo e!!'')
*37. A Deadly Battle with the Legendary Black Dragon!! (伝説の黒き龍との死闘!!, ''Densetsu no Kuroki Ryū to no Shitō!!'')
*38. A Bonded Blow With All Our Strength!! (力を合わせた絆の一撃!!, ''Chikara o Awaseta Kizuna no Ichigeki!!'')
*39. Scattered Friends (散り散りになった仲間たち, ''Chiridjiri ni Natta Nakama-tachi'')
*40. Protect the Dream of the Sniffer!! (スニッファーにかける夢を守れ!!, ''Suniffā ni Kakeru Yume o Mamore!!'')
